article.headline: Canisius 80, St. Bonaventure 71
article.story: BUFFALO, N.Y. (AP) -- -Darnell Wilson scored 19 points and grabbed 12 rebounds to lead Canisius past St. Bonaventure 80-71 on Saturday. Wilson, honored before the game for scoring reaching 1,000 career points on Wednesday night, shot 9-for-15 from the field. Chuck Harris also posted a double-double for Canisius (4-7) with 17 points and 11 rebounds. Frank Turner scored 17 points on 7-for-11 shooting and had 8 assists. Pawel Malesa made four 3-pointers for 12 points for the Golden Griffins. St. Bonaventure (3-9) extended its losing streak to seven. The Bonnies shot 41 percent from the floor and were outrebounded by Canisius 44-34. Michael Lee led St. Bonaventure with 19 points, while Paul Williams posted his tenth career double-double with 11 points and 13 rebounds. A.J. Hawkins scored 16 points and Jermaine Calvin had 10 for the Bonnies. Canisius had 28 rebounds, including 15 offensive boards, in the first half and led 45-35 at the break. The Golden Griffins shot 44.6 percent for the game. Both teams announced roster changes Saturday. Canisius said 6-foot-7 forward Ola Matti, who started all 10 games this season and was averaging 4.7 points, decided to leave after completing enough credits for graduation. Junior guard James Williams told St. Bonaventure Friday he has decided to leave school. Williams played in six games and averaged 3.4 points after missing the seasons first five games with an Achilles injury.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
